overview: GitHub has introduced a new artifact_metadata permission to give you more precise control over API access to artifact-related metadata. This permission replaces the broader contents:read and contents:write permissions for the artifact metadata APIs .

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GitHub has introduced a new artifact_metadata permission to give you more precise control over API access to artifact-related metadata. This permission replaces the broader contents:read and contents:write permissions for the artifact metadata APIs .

Transition any workflows currently using the contents permission for artifact metadata APIs to the new artifact_metadata permission before February 3, 2026, when support for the old permission will be deprecated.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: How artifact metadata improves security alerts

impact: Transition any workflows currently using the contents permission for artifact metadata APIs to the new artifact_metadata permission before February 3, 2026, when support for the old permission will be deprecated.
